animeDescription: Teropterids are evil beasts which pose as humans and live only to drink human blood. Fortunately for the human world there are groups dedicated to destroying them. A brooding and mysterious girl named Saya is the best teropterid slayer there is, and now, in 1960s Japan, she is sent to a U. S. army base which may be infested...(Source: ANN)
animeRelated: ['Adaptation: Blood: The Last Vampire (2002)', 'Alternative version: Blood+', 'Other: Blood-C']
